summary: The package provides Django form and formset implementations that handle validation, cleaning, and persistence for domain registration workflows and domain management tasks. It includes components for multiâ€‘step registration wizards (capturing applicant details, contacts, .gov specifics, tribal data, etc.) and for managing domain attributes such as contacts, nameservers, DNSSEC, DS records, organization info, security email, and user assignments.
business_intent: Enable the registrar application to collect, validate, and store all necessary data for registering new domains and administering existing domains through structured, reusable form logic.
